cause.description:
Please pledge your support for Nick as he tries to get out of jail. All money is appreciated and will be put to good use when Nick escapes to the Bahamas with the pseudonym, "Stanislav Tonkov". We would like to than Sanni for donating his identity for this cause.
1. Nick isn't guilty!
cause.mission: help Nick Harrison get out of jail.
cause.name: Help Get Nick Harrison Out of Jail
